mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no, user_id, payment_type, amount, paid, payment_time, callback_data, create_time, update_time FROM payment WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (order_no, user_id, payment_type, amount, paid, payment_time, callback_data, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{paymentType}, #{amount}, #{paid}, #{paymentTime}, #{callbackData}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
